LanguageData.PlantPotato.label: Potetplante
LanguageData.PlantPotato.description: En simpel plante, med høy næringsværdi. Gror godt, selv i dårlig jord.
LanguageData.PlantCorn.label: corn plant
LanguageData.PlantCorn.description: A large grain plant which produces ears of delicious yellow seeds. Takes a relatively long time to grow, but yields lots of food, takes a long time to spoil, and can be happily eaten raw. Needs fertile soil to grow well.
LanguageData.PlantRice.label: rice plant
LanguageData.PlantRice.description: A low grain plant that thrives in rich soil and yields food fast, but is not nice to eat uncooked.
LanguageData.PlantHaygrass.label: haygrass
LanguageData.PlantHaygrass.description: A mixture of nutrient-rich grasses which yield large amounts of hay. Hay is edible for animals, but not humans.
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.label: jordbærplante
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.description: En skrøpelig men legger frukt. Lekker selv når den er rå.
LanguageData.PlantCotton.label: bomullsplante
LanguageData.PlantCotton.description: Gir bomull, en fin plantefiber som bruges til å lage stoff.
LanguageData.PlantDevilstrand.label: djevelstrå
LanguageData.PlantDevilstrand.description: Denne sårbare soppen er genetisk utformet til å produsere silke av den høyeste kvalitet. Ryktes å ha mystiske egenskaper. Den skylder sitt navn til grådigheten som planten inspirerer i folk som produserer den.
LanguageData.PlantHealroot.label: healroot
LanguageData.PlantHealroot.description: A slow-growing plant which yields herbal medicine when harvested.\n\nHealroot was selectively bred for centuries by settlers. It is sometimes also called "healer's hand" by tribespeople - a nickname it owes to its five major medicinal virtues.
LanguageData.PlantHops.label: hop plant
LanguageData.PlantHops.description: A flowering plant that yields hops, and essential ingredient in beer.
LanguageData.PlantRose.label: rose
LanguageData.PlantDaylily.label: daglilje
